rds.vaadin.beanfaces

Class BeanFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.data.fieldgroup.FieldGroup
      • rds.vaadin.beanfaces.BeanFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Displayable

    public class BeanFace
extends com.vaadin.data.fieldgroup.FieldGroup
implements Displayable
    Allows to fastly build form interfaces based on annotated JPA entities. This approach is inspired by old vaadin 6 form and JPAContainer master-details components.

    Once the form is build you can access associated components (onetomany and manytomany) with getField().
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getLayout

        public com.vaadin.ui.Layout getLayout()
